Package edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.RequirementsManager.requirements.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAssigneeController
    Controller for the button which when pushed will add an assignee.
    AddNoteController
    Controller to add a note, and update the display.
    AttachmentController
    Controls the behaviors for adding and uploading attachments to a requirement.
    CancelAcceptanceTestController
    The Class AddAcceptanceTestController.
    CancelRequirementController
    Controller that handles the cancel requirement action.
    CreateChildRequirementController
    Controller to create child requirements.
    CreateTaskListener
    Creates a new Task.
    DeleteRequirementController
    Controller that handles the delete requirement action.
    RemoveAssigneeController
    Controller to remove an assigned user, and update display.
    RetrieveAllIterationsController
    Controller to retrieve all iterations from a requirement view.
    RetrieveAllRequirementsController
    Retrieves all of the requirements from the database
    RetrieveAttachmentController
    Controls retrieving attachments from the database.
    RetrieveParentRequirementController
    The controller to retrieve a parent requirement from the database
    RetrieveRequirementController
    A mouse listener for the requirement table on the dashboard.
    SaveAcceptanceTestController
    The Class AddAcceptanceTestController.
    SaveAttachmentController
    The Class SaveAttachmentController.
    SaveRequirementController
    Controller to handle the saving of a requirement Adapted from SaveDefectController in project DefectTracker
    SaveTaskListener
    The Class SaveTaskController
    TaskDropdownListener
    Listen on the dropdowns in the task (Assignee, Status)
    TaskFeatureListener
    Listens on the feature boxes for tasks.
    TaskFieldsListener
    The class that listens on all of the fields and validates the task based on what is in them.
    TaskSearchListener
    Listen for strings to search for.
    UpdateRequirementViewController
    live updates the views of requirements after a 'save' button has been clicked within another requirement view
